Morning Quotes.text: Every morning we are born again. What we do today matters most.
Morning Quotes.author: Buddha

Morning Quotes.text: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
Morning Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Morning Quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Morning Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Morning Quotes.text: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Morning Quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

Morning Quotes.text: I learned very early the difference between knowing the name of something and knowing something.
Morning Quotes.author: Richard Feynman

Morning Quotes.text: Nobody ever figures out what life is all about, and it doesn't matter. Explore the world. Nearly everything is really interesting if you go into it deeply enough.
Morning Quotes.author: Richard Feynman

Morning Quotes.text: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
Morning Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Morning Quotes.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
Morning Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Morning Quotes.text: Vulnerability is the birthplace of innovation, creativity, and change.
Morning Quotes.author: Brené Brown

Morning Quotes.text: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
Morning Quotes.author: Simon Sinek

Evening Quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Evening Quotes.author: John Lennon

Evening Quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Evening Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Evening Quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
Evening Quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

Evening Quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Evening Quotes.author: Confucius

Evening Quotes.text: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
Evening Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Evening Quotes.text: What I cannot create, I do not understand.
Evening Quotes.author: Richard Feynman

Evening Quotes.text: Science is the belief in the ignorance of experts.
Evening Quotes.author: Richard Feynman

Evening Quotes.text: Well done is better than well said.
Evening Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Evening Quotes.text: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
Evening Quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

Evening Quotes.text: Courage starts with showing up and letting ourselves be seen.
Evening Quotes.author: Brené Brown

Evening Quotes.text: People don't buy what you do; they buy why you do it.
Evening Quotes.author: Simon Sinek
